attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Act upon the following:
Remove our troops from Iraq to bring the British Peacekeeping force to under one thousand in line with the majority of coalition members.
Cancel the posed Trident programme and adopt a non-nuclear approach to defence of our real.
Establish an opt-out scheme for specific areas of income tax collection and spending, so that British Tax payers can nominate the section(s) of the Budget to receive, or not receive public funding.  Topics to include (but not limited to): Health; Education; Defence; Security; Public Transport.
Properly equip maintain our schools and hospitals to by increasing the percentage of GDP to be on average, along side the rest of Western Europe (West of the former ‘Iron Curtain’).
To remove the current 'Road Tax' by the appropriate level to collec the same revenue from Petrol & Diesel, but provide exemption for essential users i.d. disabled people.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several existing petitions.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
